port_desc: Port on which the client side of application will be launched
api_url_desc: Link leading to server side of the application
web3_api_url_desc: Link leading to server side of web3 part of the application
whitelist_desc: A list of addresses that are allowed access to the scholarship system. If empty, it is available to everyone
landing_menu_desc: Menu settings of landing part of site

roadmap.title: Roadmap
roadmap.description: Plans for the near future.

world.title: Our world
world.description: What does our city look like?

roadmap.description: Launch the social media accounts and discord server.
Launch The Meets website.
Launch the first access to the server for the first interaction with the city and the first mini-games.
Launch the private minting whitelist.
Launch The Meets exclusive access key NFT.
Whitelist Private minting.
Public minting.
Launch The Meets Meta server 2.0 with more games, activities integrated, server and games optimization.
The Meets Meta NFT holders first digital car snapshot.
The Meets Meta NFT holders first digital car airdrop.
The Meets residential area launch.
The Meets Meta NFT holders first property snapshot.
The Meets Meta NFT holders first property airdrop.
The Meets Meta server 3.0 optimize.
The Meets Meta Metaverse first exclusive event and airdrop.
The Meets Meta cosmetics and customization system launch.
The first cosmetics and wearables snapshot.
The first cosmetics and wearables airdrop.
The Meets Meta exclusive on-server marketplace launch.
Meets Meta marketplace on Opensea.
Meets Meta exclusive collab with a celebrity (including wearables and collectibles).

staff.name: Mohammed Khalid
staff.description: MAYC #6831 Founder and CEO of Meets app and Meetsmeta. Unconventional guy with unusual ability to get the job done.

staff.name: Icy
staff.description: Multidisciplinary designer, Founder and Lead: Icy Studios, icys.io and criator.io. Verified builder of #NFTWorlds.

staff.name: Isaac
staff.description: Coolcat #8687 Team lead; Meets App & Meetsmeta project. UI/UX designer. Metaverse Enthusiast.

staff.name: Hamid
staff.description: Seasoned software-cloud architect, CTO Meets App & MeetsMeta Project. Blockchain Enthusiast.

animation_speed_desc: Animation speed of switching pages and states ( change if you changed _variable.scss/$animationSpeed )
